scripts.dev: npm run setupEnv -- concurrently --kill-others --prefix-colors cyan,blue --names client,server "cd client && npm run dev" "cd server && npm run dev -- --preserveWatchOutput"
scripts.build: npm run setupEnv -- concurrently --prefix-colors cyan,blue --names client,server "cd client && npm run build" "cd server && npm run build"
scripts.preview: npm run setupEnv -- concurrently --kill-others --prefix-colors cyan,blue --names client,server "cd client && npm run preview" "cd server && npm run prod"
scripts.prod:first: npm run setupEnv -- caddy adapt && caddy start && pm2 start server/dist/main.js -i 0
scripts.prod: npm run setupEnv -- caddy reload && pm2 del all && pm2 start server/dist/main.js -i 0
